channel.title: Sample Music Feed
channel.description: Synthetic demo items for a sanitized pipeline repo.

item.title: Indie trio drops a new alternative single
item.description: An indie band released a new alternative track blending synth textures with live drums. The song leans into an underground aesthetic and DIY production. Fans of alt rock may enjoy the chorus-driven arrangement.

item.title: Producer explores electronic textures on a debut EP
item.description: A new EP experiments with electronic rhythms and minimal vocals. The production highlights synth layers, ambient pads, and tight percussion. The release sits between EDM and experimental sound design.

item.title: Community spotlight: local rap showcase series expands
item.description: A grassroots rap series announced additional dates and new MCs. Organizers emphasized artist empowerment and community building. The showcase will feature emerging talent and collaborative sets.
